event_data.play: Deploy Infrastructure with Docker Containers for Edge and Origin Servers
event_data.task: Configure network interfaces and veth pairs

results.stderr:
+ echo pa_ge_container1
+ cut -c1-8
+ short_name_prefix=pa_ge_co
+ echo pa_ge_container1
+ rev
+ cut -c1-2
+ rev
+ short_name_suffix=r1
+ short_name=pa_ge_co_r1
+ ip link add pa_ge_co_r1 type veth peer name v_pa_ge_co_r1
+ ip link set v_pa_ge_co_r1 up
+ ip link set v_pa_ge_co_r1 master pa_ge_S1_br
+ ip link set pa_ge_co_r1 netns pa_ge_container1
+ ip netns exec pa_ge_container1 ip link set pa_ge_co_r1 up
+ docker exec pa_ge_container1 dhclient pa_ge_co_r1
+ docker exec pa_ge_container1 ip addr show pa_ge_co_r1
+ grep inet 
+ cut -d/ -f1
+ awk {print $2}
+ IP_ADDR=172.16.232.161
+ [ -n 172.16.232.161 ]
+ echo 172.16.232.161
+ awk -F . {printf "%d.%d.%d.1", $1, $2, $3}
+ GATEWAY=172.16.232.1
+ docker exec pa_ge_container1 ip route
+ grep default
+ DEFAULT_ROUTE=default via 172.16.232.1 dev pa_ge_co_r1 
+ [ -z default via 172.16.232.1 dev pa_ge_co_r1  ]
results.cmd:
set -x
short_name_prefix="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | cut -c1-8)"
short_name_suffix="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
short_name="${short_name_prefix}_${short_name_suffix}"
#short_name="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | cut -c1-8)_$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
# Create veth pair for bridge
ip link add ${short_name} type veth peer name v_${short_name}
# Bring up veth peer in host namespace for bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} up
# Attach veth interface to the bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} master pa_ge_S1_br
# Assign container network interface to veth
ip link set ${short_name} netns 'pa_ge_container1'
# Bring up container network interface in container namespace for bridge
ip netns exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip link set ${short_name} up
# Start dhclient on container interface (Optional based on setup)
docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' dhclient ${short_name}
    # Check and add default route if not exists
IP_ADDR=$(docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip addr show ${short_name} | grep 'inet ' | awk '{print $2}' | cut -d'/' -f1)
if [ -n "$IP_ADDR" ]; then
  GATEWAY=$(echo $IP_ADDR | awk -F '.' '{printf "%d.%d.%d.1", $1, $2, $3}')
  DEFAULT_ROUTE=$(docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip route | grep default)
  if [ -z "$DEFAULT_ROUTE" ]; then
    docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip route add default via $GATEWAY
  fi
fi

module_args._raw_params:
set -x
short_name_prefix="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | cut -c1-8)"
short_name_suffix="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
short_name="${short_name_prefix}_${short_name_suffix}"
#short_name="$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | cut -c1-8)_$(echo 'pa_ge_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
# Create veth pair for bridge
ip link add ${short_name} type veth peer name v_${short_name}
# Bring up veth peer in host namespace for bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} up
# Attach veth interface to the bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} master pa_ge_S1_br
# Assign container network interface to veth
ip link set ${short_name} netns 'pa_ge_container1'
# Bring up container network interface in container namespace for bridge
ip netns exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip link set ${short_name} up
# Start dhclient on container interface (Optional based on setup)
docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' dhclient ${short_name}
    # Check and add default route if not exists
IP_ADDR=$(docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip addr show ${short_name} | grep 'inet ' | awk '{print $2}' | cut -d'/' -f1)
if [ -n "$IP_ADDR" ]; then
  GATEWAY=$(echo $IP_ADDR | awk -F '.' '{printf "%d.%d.%d.1", $1, $2, $3}')
  DEFAULT_ROUTE=$(docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip route | grep default)
  if [ -z "$DEFAULT_ROUTE" ]; then
    docker exec 'pa_ge_container1' ip route add default via $GATEWAY
  fi
fi

+ ip link set v_pa_ge_co_r1 master pa_ge_S1_br
